name: All Saints - Dedicacion Habano - Mitre
additionalNotes: From the finest tobacco farmers to the gentle hands of our rollers, All Saints Cigars are produced withÂ dedication and care. Secondary flavors of earth, lemon peel, cedar, cinnamon and a slight floral note flit in and out, while the retrohale features both black pepper and a small amount of raisin sweetness, the latter of which seems to be getting a bit stronger as the first third burns down.
